hexforce.page.example_actions.example/co: Accepts an entity, returns whether the caster is allied with that entity.
hexforce.page.example_spells.rotate/spel: Accepts an entity and a vector, rotates the entity in direction of a vector.
hexforce.page.example_spells.lesser_tele: Accepts an entity and a vector, then teleports the entity to its vector but with all fractions changed to given number, where fractions are number divided by 100, so 56 would be 0.56 and 9 would be 0.09. for example if given 5 and entity is on [35,11 9,56 10] it teleports it to [35,05 9,05 10,05]. It only takes numbers form 0 to 99. Costs 1/2 of amethyst dust.
text.autoconfig.hexforce.title: Your Mod Configs
